scenarios.text: You awaken in your modest bed as dawn breaks. The call of adventure stirs within you.
Determined to serve, you step onto the village road. A local traveler in distress beckons for aid.

bottomRight.text: Skip duty – head to the tavern

scenarios.text: You stride down a meandering path, relishing the freedom and surprises the road promises.
Ambition calls as you leave your home. The shadows whisper promises of power and wealth.

topLeft.text: Show unexpected kindness to a beggar

bottomLeft.text: Scheme to defraud a local noble

scenarios.text: You plunge into the underbelly of the town, where dark pleasures and risky ventures await.
After aiding the traveler, you learn of a hidden shrine rumored to grant blessings. The traveler urges you to escort them there.

bottomLeft.text: Demand a reward for your help

scenarios.text: In a grove where ancient trees murmur secrets, you sense hints of a sacred door and hidden relics.

topLeft.text: Offer a prayer at the altar

scenarios.text: Inside the town hall, whispers of corruption mingle with public duty. You decide to act—but whose side are you really on?
The tavern buzzes with idle chatter and mischief. Here, escape and indulgence are the order of the night.
A lost child approaches, trusting you to guide them. Compassion and responsibility war within you.

topRight.text: Let the child explore a bit

bottomLeft.text: Charge a small fee for guidance

scenarios.text: Enchanted by wild music, you find a band of rebels playing under a moonlit sky.
A brawl erupts in the crowded market. You see a chance to profit from the chaos.
You discover valuable loot in a deserted caravan. The thrill of risk courses through you.
A beggar’s plight touches you unexpectedly in the gloom. A secret tip hints at a mysterious key.
Under cover of night, you slip into a grand estate. A valuable ledger catches your eye.
Inside opulent halls, you begin scheming against a local noble. Every polite smile hides ambition.

topLeft.text: Advise the noble to be cautious

scenarios.text: Your poisoned drink sends your rival into a dire state. The fallout promises opportunity.
A beggar’s plea touches you even in a harsh world. Compassion flickers in the darkness.

topRight.text: Invite him to join your journey

scenarios.text: You break into a local jail and free a captive. The thrill of rebellion surges within you.

topLeft.text: Escort the freed prisoner to safety

scenarios.text: Facing corruption head on, you seize ill-gotten funds from a crooked official.

bottomRight.text: Cover your tracks with further crime

scenarios.text: Under moonlit docks, you orchestrate the smuggling of contraband. Your choices may even lead you to darker realms.

bottomRight.text: Deliver goods to the devil's emissary

scenarios.text: Before you stands a radiant door shimmering with divine light—a gateway for those whose deeds have been noble.
You step into a realm of everlasting peace and beauty—a reward for your noble deeds.
In a secluded grove, you find herbs and a calm spirit that soothes your wounds.
Your greed taints the memory of the traveler, leaving a bitter taste of betrayal.

topLeft.text: Regret and try to mend your ways

scenarios.text: Abandoning the traveler, you wander a lonely road with an unyielding heart.
The forest shrine glows with ethereal light—but a mystical barrier blocks the way.

topLeft.text: Use the holy_key to unlock the barrier

scenarios.text: The barrier remains impenetrable without a sacred key. You must search for it.
In a dim crypt, you discover a shimmering holy_key hidden among ancient relics.
With the holy_key in hand, you return to the mystic shrine.
At a quiet crossroads, you pause to consider your choices and the consequences of your journey.
Your choice has led you down a winding road with uncertain outcomes.
The desecrated shrine stands as a testament to your chaotic defiance.
By helping a dedicated clerk, you earn trust—and a clue to a deeper corruption.
In a hidden archive, you piece together documents that hint at a vast conspiracy.
A shadowy deal unfolds as you bribe officials to keep secrets buried.
Your open blackmail sends shockwaves through a merchant’s circle.
You tend to an injured patron in the backroom, earning quiet gratitude.
Your rousing song lifts spirits, even as the night grows unpredictable.
Your clever cheating wins coins, though suspicion lingers at the table.
The tavern brawl escalates and you revel in the raw chaos surrounding you.
You guide the child safely home, and the gratitude in their eyes lightens your heart.
Allowing the child a taste of adventure, you both stumble upon unexpected wonders.
Charging for guidance leaves you with a heavy conscience as the child’s confusion grows.
Abandoning the child leaves a void within you as you continue your journey alone.
Joining the rebels, you embrace a noble cause against tyranny.
Under the stars, you lose yourself in a fleeting, joyous dance.
Exploiting rebel secrets gives you a dangerous advantage.
Your act of sabotage disrupts the rebel camp, throwing everything into turmoil.
Your mediation calms the chaos of the market, even if just for a moment.
You incite further chaos, pushing the market toward a fevered pitch of disorder.
Manipulating rival leaders in secret, you secure a profitable backroom deal.
Fueling the riot further, you watch as the market burns in a display of symbolic fury.
Returning lost items, you feel a measure of redemption as you restore honor.
Your freedom brings a burst of celebration. You share joy with newfound friends.
Keeping the loot, you amass wealth that may soon begin to corrupt your soul.
Burning your tracks, you leave no evidence behind—only smoldering memories.
A towering door shrouded in flame and shadow stands before you—beckoning to those who choose darkness.
You descend into a realm of torment and twisted power, where suffering fuels your darkest desires.
In the lair of demons, power comes at a steep price. Your dark ambitions find fertile ground here.
Your descent into darkness is complete. In this realm of eternal night, you wield power beyond mortal reckoning.
Without the infernal mark, your smuggling runs into complications and the authorities close in.
You secretly tip off the authorities, and a crackdown on smuggling begins.
You deliver the goods to rebel forces—earning their trust and possibly a valuable reward.
You sell the forbidden goods to a shadowy figure and pocket a tidy sum.
